about.title: about
description: I'm a self-taught front-end developer from Lagos, Nigeria. For over two years, I've been creating responsive, user-friendly websites from scratch, turning creative ideas into modern web experiences.
My passion lies in using the latest technologies to help clients establish a powerful online presence and contribute to the growth of technology worldwide.
I always strive to learn about the newest technologies and frameworks.

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.text: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me

facts.title: fun-facts
list: I like winter more than summer
I have a dream to travel the world to taste all kinds of food
I play video games and a anime fan
I enjoy learning new things and connecting with new individuals
